SELECT buc.coupon_name,buc.coupon_amount,buc.deadline,bp.name,count(coupon_name) couponcount FROM ( SELECT coupon_name,coupon_amount,deadline,coupon_park FROM base_user_coupon WHERE username = ( SELECT username FROM wechat_user WHERE status = 1 and token = #{token}) and status = '00' and deadline >= now() ) buc LEFT JOIN base_parklist bp on bp.parkid = buc.coupon_park GROUP BY buc.coupon_name
